DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Profile Study BG00012 Standard Formulation BG00012 Active Pharmaceutical Ingredient
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males 18 55 year old , inclusive , time informed consent . 2 . Must weigh 50 kg 110 kg , inclusive . 3 . Must body mass index ( BMI ) 19 kg/m2 30 kg/m2 , inclusive . 4 . All subject must practice effective contraception study willing able continue contraception 30 day last dose study treatment . 5 . Must nonsmoker , use chew tobacco , least 6 month prior Day 1 . 6 . Must screen physical examination ECG without clinically significant abnormality ( determined Investigator ) . 1 . History malignancy ( subject basal cell carcinoma completely excise prior study entry remain eligible ) . 2 . History severe allergic anaphylactic reaction . 3 . History clinically significant endocrinologic , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal , major disease , determine Investigator . 4 . Clinically significant abnormal hematology blood chemistry value , determine Investigator . 5 . Serious infection ( e.g. , pneumonia , septicemia ) within 2 month prior Day 1 .
